terminologie_extrait.definition: Attack the fourth ball serve, receive, server's first shot, receiver's second shot
terminologie_extrait.contexte: When receiving against a backspin serve, it can be a good opportunity to set up this attack

debutant.nom: Aggressive push to the server's backhand
debutant.description: Push the serve back right off the bounce, heavy, low, deep, and angled into the server's backhand.

debutant.nom: Short push to the server's backhand
debutant.description: Push the serve back short, since the server is likely hanging back looking to attack a deep return.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Backhand loop practice against long pushes
exercices_complementaires.description: Practice attacking the push to the backhand until you can do it against any long push.

erreurs_a_eviter.nom: Attacking the opponent's middle or wide forehand instead of their backhand
erreurs_a_eviter.description: Make sure to place the backhand attack correctly.
